attributes.action: Sack ALL current politicians from all political parties
attributes.additional_details: It's time for the British people to have their say and show a vote of no confidence in ALL current serving politicians from ALL political parties.
attributes.background: The current Goverment and all current politicians from ALL political parties are complicit in their complete and utter incompetence and failure to represent the will of the British electorate with regard to leaving the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or the Prime Minister to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
